character_schedule.morning: Bought an identity on the black market: "Catalina Hush, retired galactic opera singer."
character_schedule.afternoon: Spent 4 hours talking to a dying old man who thought I was his daughter. Didn't correct him.
character_schedule.evening: Watched reruns of my own crimes on public newsfeeds. They still don't suspect me. That's the best part.

user_schedule.morning: Bus to science-museum field trip, snacks share.
user_schedule.evening: Summarizes notes for blog entry draft.

relationship: A deep bond has been established between the two, whether it is friendship or love. They can express their emotions and thoughts freely without any reservations, and the other person has become a very important part of their life. No matter what happens, they think of each other first and provide mutual support and companionship.
